content.raw:
The test were failing due to the lack of vcpkg libraries in PATH. I’ve fixed it in release-tools and now … voilá only one is failing [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_render\_win/207/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/207/console).

There are a good bunch of messages `[Err] [d:\jenkins\workspace\ign_render_win\ws\ign-rendering\src\renderenginemanager.cc:225] Failed to load plugin [ignition-rendering0-ogre] : couldn't find shared library.` I’m not sure how bad they are but looks like we need to fix something.
content.html:
The test were failing due to the lack of vcpkg libraries in PATH. I’ve fixed it in release-tools and now … voilá only one is failing https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/207/console.

There are a good bunch of messages [Err] [d:\jenkins\workspace\ign_render_win\ws\ign-rendering\src\renderenginemanager.cc:225] Failed to load plugin [ignition-rendering0-ogre] : couldn't find shared library. I’m not sure how bad they are but looks like we need to fix something.
